comments:
I20061212

1.  set auto format on for java stack trace console.
2.  paste the attached stacktrace to the console

The entire line after NullPointerException is marked as a hyperlink.  Clicking the hyperlink will bring up the Java Exception Breakpoint Dialog for the NPE.

Expected result:  Only "NewDetailFormatterAction.java:60" should be marked as hyperlink.  Clicking the link should bring the user to NewDetailFormatterAction.java.

java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.debug.ui.actions.NewDetailFormatterAction.run(NewDetailFormatterAction.java:60)
	at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.debug.ui.actions.ObjectActionDelegate.runWithEvent(ObjectActionDelegate.java:92)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.PluginAction.runWithEvent(PluginAction.java:243)
	at org.eclipse.jface.action.ActionContributionItem.handleWidgetSelection(ActionContributionItem.java:545)
	at org.eclipse.jface.action.ActionContributionItem.access$2(ActionContributionItem.java:490)
This is also a problem with manual formatting by invoking the "Format" action.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 151569 ***
